Double Punch/Manterror/Injector:


Double Punch in cloaked mode exited the Predacon base, raising both pinchers. 
 He fired an energy-singature seeking missile off at Falcore, and an 
energy-signature seeking missile off at Sniper.

Manterror exited the Predacon base, firing two ion disks off, one at 
Falcore's left knee, one at his right knee.

Injector fired two stinger missiles off at the ground in front of Falcore's 
feet.
